# piano Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "piano" {
  endpoint  = "https://sandbox.piano.io/api/v3"
  api_token = "*********************"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_token` (String) API Token for piano.io API
- `endpoint` (String) Base endpoint for piano.io API
